document_data.mainbody:
lister Noggins was a rock gnome priest of Gond from Loudwater.
Elister lived in Loudwater as a clockmaker with his friend the clockwork construct Tick Tock.
In the late 1480s or early 1490s DR, he was captured by some stone giant raiders that took him to their thane Kayalithica when Elister said he knew about Loudwaters defenses. The stone giant put him inside a pouch tied to her mithral belt while waiting for her minions to check if the gnome told the truth about his citys defenses.
